statements.insert:
select SEQ_SM_MATERIEL_LEVEL.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into SM_Materiel_Level ( I_IntId, C_MaterielCode, C_MaterielName, C_MaterielSpec, C_MaterielModel, C_CreateUserName, C_CreateTime, C_UpdateUserName, C_UpdateTime )values (#IntId#,#MaterielCode#,#MaterielName#,#MaterielSpec#,#MaterielModel#,#CreateUserName#,#CreateTime#,#UpdateUserName#,#UpdateTime#)
statements.update: update SM_Materiel_Level set C_MaterielCode=#MaterielCode#, C_MaterielName=#MaterielName#, C_MaterielSpec=#MaterielSpec#, C_MaterielModel=#MaterielModel#, C_UpdateUserName=#UpdateUserName#, C_UpdateTime=#UpdateTime# where I_IntId = #IntId#
statements.select: select a.I_IntId ,a.C_MaterielCode ,a.C_MaterielName ,a.C_MaterielSpec ,a.C_MaterielModel ,a.C_CreateUserName ,a.C_UpdateUserName ,a.C_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateTime from SM_Materiel_Level a order by a.I_IntId desc

select a.I_IntId ,a.C_MaterielCode ,a.C_MaterielName ,a.C_MaterielSpec ,a.C_MaterielModel ,a.C_CreateUserName ,a.C_UpdateUserName ,a.C_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateTime from SM_Materiel_Level a where rownum=1 order by a.C_MaterielCode desc

select a.I_IntId ,a.C_MaterielCode ,a.C_MaterielName ,a.C_MaterielSpec ,a.C_MaterielModel ,a.C_CreateUserName ,a.C_UpdateUserName ,a.C_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateTime from SM_Materiel_Level a where a.C_MaterielName=#value# order by a.I_IntId desc
